metadata.title: CVE-2014-9896 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: drivers/char/adsprpc.c in the Qualcomm components in Android before2016-08-05 on Nexus 5 and 7 (2013) devices does not properly validateparameters and return values, which allows attackers to obtain sensitiveinformation via a crafted application, aka Android internal bug 28767593and Qualcomm internal bug CR551795.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
